text: Okavela atadu (mudavasari) vidakuliste, a tarvata a stri ataniki dharmasam'matam kadu, ame vivaham vere purusunito jarigite tappa! Okavela atadu (rendava bharta) ameku vidakuliste! Appudu ubhayulu (modati bharta, i stri) tamu allah haddulaku lobadi undagalamani bhaviste varu punarvivaham cesukovatanlo dosam ledu mariyu ivi allah niyamincina haddulu. Vitini ayana grahince variki spastaparustunnadu
